channel.title: shared directory on where to build and share personal knowlegebase
channel.description: Recent content in shared directory on where to build and share personal knowlegebase

item.title: windows docker mount shared directory
item.description: In docker for windows: Mount d:/logs directory into ubuntu contain as /data docker run -it -v d:/Logs:/data ubuntu /bin/sh or docker run -it -v d:/Logs:/data ubuntu bash Mount directory to nginx > docker run –name blogserver -v D:/Dropbox/Dropbox/blog/personal_blog/suwenjiang.github.com:/usr/share/nginx/html:ro -d -p 7777:80 nginx Reference
